channel.title: CVE Feed for handysoft -- HShell.dll
channel.description: The latest CVEs for handysoft -- HShell.dll

item.title: CVE-2021-26608|2024-08-03T20:26:25.562Z -- handysoft -- hshell.dll
item.description: An arbitrary file download and execution vulnerability was found in the HShell.dll of handysoft Co., Ltd groupware ActiveX module. This issue is due to missing support for integrity check of download URL or downloaded file hash.
